overview: To celebrate its 100th DCOM ("Adventures in Babysitting," a remake of the 1987 movie), the channel is showing a Memorial Day weekend marathon of fifty-one movies, while the other 48 will play over the course of June, leading up to the debut of the newest film on June 24.
tagline: If it's a movie so nice, make it twice (or thrice)
title: Celebrating 100 Disney Channel Original Movies
